hcaptcha.title: hCaptcha Settings
hcaptcha.description: Configure hCaptcha protection for login forms
hcaptcha.enabled_help: When enabled, users must complete a captcha challenge to log in
hcaptcha.site_key_help: Your hCaptcha site key (get it from hcaptcha.com)
hcaptcha.secret_key_help: Your hCaptcha secret key (keep this private)
hcaptcha.size_help: Widget size (compact works better on mobile)
hcaptcha.error_site_key_required: Site key is required when hCaptcha is enabled
hcaptcha.error_secret_key_required: Secret key is required when hCaptcha is enabled
hcaptcha.error_verification: Captcha verification failed. Please try again.
hcaptcha.error_invalid: Captcha verification failed. Please try again.
hcaptcha.env_override_notice: Note: Keys can be overridden via OCMS_HCAPTCHA_SITE_KEY and OCMS_HCAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY environment variables
